pageContext.claim: “As has been stated by numerous legal scholars, I have the absolute right to PARDON myself, but why would I do that when I have done nothing wrong? In the meantime, the never ending Witch Hunt, led by 13 very Angry and Conflicted Democrats (& others) continues into the mid-terms!”
pageContext.analysis: This startling claim would likely be challenged all the way to the Supreme Court, if Trump actually took this politically perilous step. Legal scholars would dispute whether Trump has an "absolute right" to self-pardon since it's never been tested.
